title: Print numbers from 1 to n without using a loop
contentHtml:
Write a program to print numbers from 1 to n without using a loop

Input  : 5
Output : 1 2 3 4 5

#include <stdio.h>

void printNumbersFromOneToN(int n)
{

    if (n <= 0)
    {
        return;
    }

    printNumbersFromOneToN(n - 1);

    printf("%d ", n);
}

int main()
{
    int input;

    printf("Enter an Integer: \n");
    scanf("%d", &input);

    printNumbersFromOneToN(input);

    return 0;
}

    printNumbers(n - 1);
    console.log(n);

def printNumber(num)
  if num > 0
    printNumber(num - 1)
    print("#{num} ") 
  end
end

puts printNumber(5)
